rules_text: Create two 1/1 blue Bird creature tokens with flying.
flavor_text:
[i]“Do you see how the birds leave their nest, yearning for the sky? So too must we rise from Simua towards our true home.”
—Tadhana, Simua matron[/i]
notes:
pushing this to common from Midnight Haunting felt like it merited an extra color weight at least
